summary: VEHICLES TRANSMISSION LINE  KEEPS DISCONNECTING FOR THE BOTTOM OF THE VEHICLE. THIS RESULTS IN A FUEL LEAK, WHICH CAN  CAUSE AN ACCIDENT, DUE TO THE FACT IF A VEHICLE  IS BEHIND  WHEN THE FUEL LEAKS  THEY CAN SLIDE INTO THE BACK OF CONSUMER.  THE DEALERSHIP REPLACE PARTS BUT THE PROBLEM RECURS. THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THIS MAKE/MODEL VEHICLE.  PLEASE PROVIDE MORE DETAILS. TS
